name: The Secondeer
description:
Battle evil robots in the world of Ethion as a Secondeer, a skilled warrior who uses a power suit to destroy bots, but be careful. Your suit has only enough power to be used for about 30 seconds.

Dodge and shoot robots to try and get the highest score you can!

Collect batteries to regain power.

Inspired by RWBY. Made for the Let's Create Game Jam #1.
